name: Nestle Nido 1+ Growing Up Milk Powder (1-3 Y)
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in Bangladesh and its raw materials are collected from Switzerland. Important Notice: There are no substitutes for or equivalent to breast milk. Nestle NIDO 1+ is a Growing Up Milk Powder for 1 to 3-year-old growing up children. It contains-Prebiotics (Inulin & Fructooligosaccharides)6 Immuno-nutrients (Iron, Zinc, Selenium, Vitamin A, D & C) among 22 essential vitamins & minerals]Milk ProteinHoneyNo added sucrose Net Weight: 350 gmManufactured by: Nestlé Chile S.A.Formulated by: Nestle Switzerland S.A.Marketed by: Nestle Bangladesh Limited

name: Nestle Cerelac 1 Wheat & Three Fruits (6 M+)
description:

name: Aptamil 1 First Infant Milk (From Birth)
description:
Help your children to grow healthier and faster. Get Aptamil First Infant Baby Milk Stage 1 (From Birth) - 800g and help your child enjoy every moment. The product is available in Bangladesh. Mixed with high-quality ingredients it will provide sufficient nutrients to promote healthy growth. With 29% fortified milk and dual prebiotics, it will help your kids immensely to help with digestion. The product also contains DHA which also helps to improve brain function and eyesight. The formula contains the necessary nutrients and vitamins to support with immune system. The milk is safe to use feed. It does not contain any palm oil, preservatives, or harsh chemicals. You can get this amazing milk formula for your little one and help them stay fit.  Key benefits of Aptamil 3 Growing Up Baby Milk Powder:  •Has 29% dairy-based milk.•Maintain essential nutrients.•Helps to boost cognitive function.•Increase eye vision.•Helps with digestion.•Develop a better immune system.•Helps to strengthen bones and teeth.•Has fortified milk.•Improve the process of normal growth.•Does not have palm oil.•Has plentiful protein, iron, and calcium.•Support with significant nutritional needs.•It provides nourishment. Technical details of the Product:•Brand: Aptamil•Model: 1•Product Type: Milk Powder•Usability: Infant from birth•Packaging: Plastic container•Concern: Nutrition

name: Mother's Smile Lacto Fix Anti Diarrhoea Formula Tin
description:
Completely Lactose-Free Formula, ages 0 to 24, Suitable for babies with Lactose intolerance. Anti-Diarrhoea / Lactose-free formula, ages 0 to 24 months, contains apple and banana powder with corn starch, which is very important for quick recovery during the diarrhoeal period.

name: Nestle Cerelac Honey & Wheat (12 M+)
description:
Nestlé Cerelac Honey & Wheat is a specially designed complementary food for toddlers aged 12 months and older. It combines the goodness of wheat and the natural sweetness of honey with essential nutrients to support your baby’s physical and mental development. This delicious cereal is easy to digest and perfect for growing toddlers transitioning to a more varied diet. Key Ingredients 1. Wheat Flour: Provides a rich source of energy and essential carbohydrates to fuel your toddler's active day.2. Honey: A natural sweetener that adds flavor and provides a boost of natural energy.3. Milk Solids: Contribute to calcium and protein intake, supporting strong bones and muscles.4. Iron: A critical nutrient for brain development and maintaining healthy hemoglobin levels.5. Vitamins and Minerals: Includes Vitamin A, C, D, Zinc, and B-complex vitamins to support overall growth, immunity, and development.  Nutritional Benefits 1. Rich in Iron: Provides up to 50% of your toddler’s daily iron requirement, supporting cognitive development and preventing iron deficiency.2. Boosts Immunity: Enriched with Vitamin C, Vitamin A, and Zinc to strengthen the immune system and promote healthy growth.3. Supports Bone Development: Calcium and Vitamin D contribute to strong bones and teeth.4. Energy for Growth: Carbohydrates from wheat and natural sugars from honey offer sustained energy for active toddlers.5. Easy to Digest: Tailored for your toddler’s developing digestive system, ensuring comfort with every meal.   Additional Information • Age Suitability: Designed for toddlers 12 months and older.• Pack Size: 400g, convenient for regular use and easy storage.• Storage: Keep in a cool, dry place, and reseal the pack tightly after each use.
Nestlé Cerelac Honey & Wheat is a specially designed complementary food for toddlers aged 12 months and older. It combines the goodness of wheat and the natural sweetness of honey with essential nutrients to support your baby’s physical and mental development. This delicious cereal is easy to digest and perfect for growing toddlers transitioning to a more varied diet.
 
Key Ingredients
 
1. Wheat Flour: Provides a rich source of energy and essential carbohydrates to fuel your toddler's active day.
2. Honey: A natural sweetener that adds flavor and provides a boost of natural energy.
3. Milk Solids: Contribute to calcium and protein intake, supporting strong bones and muscles.
4. Iron: A critical nutrient for brain development and maintaining healthy hemoglobin levels.
5. Vitamins and Minerals: Includes Vitamin A, C, D, Zinc, and B-complex vitamins to support overall growth, immunity, and development.
 
 
Nutritional Benefits
 
1. Rich in Iron: Provides up to 50% of your toddler’s daily iron requirement, supporting cognitive development and preventing iron deficiency.
2. Boosts Immunity: Enriched with Vitamin C, Vitamin A, and Zinc to strengthen the immune system and promote healthy growth.
3. Supports Bone Development: Calcium and Vitamin D contribute to strong bones and teeth.
4. Energy for Growth: Carbohydrates from wheat and natural sugars from honey offer sustained energy for active toddlers.
5. Easy to Digest: Tailored for your toddler’s developing digestive system, ensuring comfort with every meal.
 
 
 
Additional Information
 
• Age Suitability: Designed for toddlers 12 months and older.
• Pack Size: 400g, convenient for regular use and easy storage.
• Storage: Keep in a cool, dry place, and reseal the pack tightly after each use.

name: Nestle Cerelac Rice & Milk (6 months +) Tin
description:
Cerelac Stage 1 Rice & Milk 400g is a baby food cereal that is suitable for infants aged 6 months and above. It is made with a blend of rice flour and milk powder, which provide essential nutrients, such as carbohydrates, protein, vitamins, and minerals, that are important for the growth and development of the baby.Cerelac Stage 1 Rice & Milk is a convenient and nutritious baby food option for busy parents who want to provide their babies with a healthy and balanced diet. •Product type : Baby Food•Brand : Cerelac•Capacity : 400 gm•NESTLE CERELAC Infant Cereals with iRON+ RICE 400g Tin for your baby from 6 months•A nutritious and convenient rice based infant cereal with milk powder•Fortified with iRON+ which helps support brain and cognitive development•Contains BL and immunonutrients (A, C, D and Zinc) to support your baby’s immune systemMade from natural grain and easily digestible•Item Form : Powder•A highly nutritious, easily digested instant cereal Safety Information•Avoid direct sunlight IngredientsWhite Rice Flour, Dried Skimmed Milk, Sucrose, Palm Olein, Low Erucic Acid Rapeseed Oil, Coconut Oil, Sunflower Oil, Vanilla Flavor, Bifidus Culture, Minerals & Vitamins. Contains Milk. Legal DisclaimerActual product packaging and materials may contain more and different information than what is shown on our website. We recommend that you do not rely solely on the information presented and that you always read labels, warnings, and directions before using or consuming a product.
Cerelac Stage 1 Rice & Milk 400g is a baby food cereal that is suitable for infants aged 6 months and above. It is made with a blend of rice flour and milk powder, which provide essential nutrients, such as carbohydrates, protein, vitamins, and minerals, that are important for the growth and development of the baby.Cerelac Stage 1 Rice & Milk is a convenient and nutritious baby food option for busy parents who want to provide their babies with a healthy and balanced diet.

Made from natural grain and easily digestible
•Item Form : Powder
•A highly nutritious, easily digested instant cereal
 
Safety Information
•Avoid direct sunlight
 
Ingredients
White Rice Flour, Dried Skimmed Milk, Sucrose, Palm Olein, Low Erucic Acid Rapeseed Oil, Coconut Oil, Sunflower Oil, Vanilla Flavor, Bifidus Culture, Minerals & Vitamins. Contains Milk.
 
Legal Disclaimer
Actual product packaging and materials may contain more and different information than what is shown on our website. We recommend that you do not rely solely on the information presented and that you always read labels, warnings, and directions before using or consuming a product.

name: Biomil 3 Follow-Up Milk Formula Powder (1-2 Y)
description:
Biomil 3 Follow-Up Milk Formula Powder has been specially developed to balance nutrition and favour the maximum growth of children aged 1 year and over. Biomil 3 Follow-Up Milk Formula Powder is a preparation based on fresh cows’ milk, rich in energy so as to meet the increased energy needs for this age group. Biomil 3 Follow-Up Milk Formula Powder contains milk proteins, vegetable oils, lactose, maltodextrin and saccharose. Biomil 3 Follow-Up Milk Formula Powder is enriched with essential fatty acids, iron, zinc, copper, iodine, and 13 vitamins including most notably vitamins A, B, C, D, E, and K so as to meet the needs of small children.

name: Mother's Smile Cereal Rice & Milk Tin
Mother's Smile Cereal 4 Fruits, Milk & Wheat Tin
Fasska Gastro-Fix Special Formula Tin
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from Belgium. GASTRO-FIX is a special nutritional formula for the management of acute diarrhoea. GASTRO-FIX is a temporary (5-7 days) formula specifically designed for the recovery (after rehydration in combination with O.R.S.) from severe diarrhoea of infants & young children and to fulfil the nutritional needs during this period.  Main characteristics: Adapted carbohydrates content (Lactose free) Enriched with electrolytes (Na, K, and Cl & Zn) to correct the losses No added Iron to avoid enhancement of diarrhoeal symptoms Specific fat and protein content allows an adequate intake of nutrients despite impaired digestion and absorption during an episode of acute diarrhoea Important notice: Breast milk is the best food for infants. If breastfeeding is not available or not sufficient, an infant formula may be used according to Health professionals' guidance.
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from Belgium.

If breastfeeding is not available or not sufficient, an infant formula may be used according to Health professionals' guidance.

name: Nestle Cerelac 4 Apple Corn Flakes (12 M+)
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in Bangladesh and its raw materials are collected from Switzerland. Important Notice: There is no substitutes of or equivalent to breast-milk.Nestlé CERELAC Wheat & Apple, Corn Flakes with Milk is produced as per the Bangladesh standard for processed cereal-based foods for infants and young children. CERELAC Stage 4 is an Infant Cereal for babies from 12 months to 24 months.Nestlé CERELAC Wheat & Apple, Corn Flakes contains: - 12 vitamins & 7 minerals that may help in the normal development of a baby - Vitamin A, C, Zinc & Bifidus BL fortification that may help in building the immune system - IRON+ (Iron, Omega 3, Vitamin C, Iodine, Vitamin B1) which may help in the brain & cognitive development.Net Weight: 350 gmFormulated by: Nestle Switzerland S.A.Product of: Nestle Bangladesh Limited

name: PediaSure Vanilla Delight
description:
PediaSure Vanilla Delight 375 gm is a scientifically formulated nutritional supplement designed for growing children aged 2 years and above. Enriched with 37 vital nutrients, it supports physical growth, brain development, and immunity. Its delicious vanilla flavor makes it a favorite among children, while its balanced composition ensures optimal nourishment. Ingredients: Carbohydrates (Maltodextrin, Sucrose), Proteins (Milk Protein Concentrate, Soy Protein Isolate), Fats (Vegetable Oils, MCT Oil), Vitamins & Minerals: Vitamin A, C, D, E, B-complex, Calcium, Iron, Zinc, and more, DHA: For brain development, Prebiotics & Probiotics: To support gut health. Supports growth and development, Long time expire date, Premium Quality, Good for Your Healthy Life, Highest quality. Product Flavour: pediasure high quality protein. Benefits: Supports Growth: Helps in weight gain and height development with essential nutrients.Boosts Immunity: Contains antioxidants, vitamins, and minerals to strengthen the immune system.Brain Development: Enriched with DHA and choline for cognitive and brain health.Digestive Health: Includes prebiotics and probiotics for a healthy gut.Energy Provider: High-calorie formula to fuel active lifestyles. Uses:Nutritional Supplement: Mix with milk or water as a complete and balanced meal replacement.Meal Complement: Serve as a snack or complement to meals.Recovery Nutrition: Helps regain strength during recovery periods. Storage Information:Store in a cool, dry place. Once opened, use within 3 weeks for the best quality. Keep the container tightly closed after each use.
PediaSure Vanilla Delight 375 gm is a scientifically formulated nutritional supplement designed for growing children aged 2 years and above. Enriched with 37 vital nutrients, it supports physical growth, brain development, and immunity. Its delicious vanilla flavor makes it a favorite among children, while its balanced composition ensures optimal nourishment.
 
Ingredients: Carbohydrates (Maltodextrin, Sucrose), Proteins (Milk Protein Concentrate, Soy Protein Isolate), Fats (Vegetable Oils, MCT Oil), Vitamins & Minerals: Vitamin A, C, D, E, B-complex, Calcium, Iron, Zinc, and more, DHA: For brain development, Prebiotics & Probiotics: To support gut health.
 
Supports growth and development, Long time expire date, Premium Quality, Good for Your Healthy Life, Highest quality. 
Product Flavour: pediasure high quality protein.
 
Benefits: 
Supports Growth: Helps in weight gain and height development with essential nutrients.
Boosts Immunity: Contains antioxidants, vitamins, and minerals to strengthen the immune system.
Brain Development: Enriched with DHA and choline for cognitive and brain health.
Digestive Health: Includes prebiotics and probiotics for a healthy gut.
Energy Provider: High-calorie formula to fuel active lifestyles.
 
Uses:
Nutritional Supplement: Mix with milk or water as a complete and balanced meal replacement.
Meal Complement: Serve as a snack or complement to meals.
Recovery Nutrition: Helps regain strength during recovery periods.
 
Storage Information:
Store in a cool, dry place. Once opened, use within 3 weeks for the best quality. Keep the container tightly closed after each use.
